document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Zarimtar Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Zarimtar Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Zarimtar Street'''<ref group="note">Zarmitar Street is used less frequently is some sources and it believed to be a typo. was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Zarimtar Street was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on [[Sul Street]] where it branched west to end at a large intersection that included [[the Sutherlane]], [[Feather Street]], [[Darselune Street]], and [[Haltovar Street]]. [[Mendever Street]] crossed Zarimtar Street near its midpoint and [[Cloaksweep Alley]] connected with it just north of the [[Courtyard of the Well]].
